hello.text: Hello professor. I think your last experiment went a bit overboard...

which.name: Which experiment already ?
which.text: Ah, I should have seen this coming. I told you not to drink these old fashion liquors...

which.name: Tell her you couldn't resist, since they were flavoured with real strawberry.
which.text: Yeah well, that and experiments don't mix well. I mean look at me !

ask.name: Ask the bat youkai how she got here.
ask.text: Well, obviously it was in this tank.

who.name: Ask the bat youkai who she is.

help.name: Ask her if she can help with your friend's condition.
help.text: Ah, she must have been infected by one of the seeds.{n}I should be able to heal her... for a price

accept.name: Accept the Youkai's deal, whatever it is.
accept.narrator: {s}She agitates her wand in the air.{n}Chiyuri gets healed, but at the price of your soul...{i}

check.name: Look at her closely.
check.narrator: {i}You can find out stawberry plants growing on her.{n}A few fruits are ready to be picked.{s}

analyse.name: Take some samples of her cells.
analyse.narrator: {i}You'll need some laboratory equipment to analyse them.{s}

analyse.name: Analyse the jam.
analyse.narrator: {i}It looks like something straight out of Makai.{n}What was the border police doing ?{s}

analyse.name: Study the bat Youkai.
analyse.narrator: {i}You manage to find out they carry naturally some kind of virus.{n}You make a vaccine for it.{s}

science.name: Bring her to the laboratory.
science.narrator: {i}For some reason, the password has been changed...{s}

science.name: Enter the laboratory
science.narrator: {i}It is a mess. The wall of the vessel is destroyed.{n}and there is a tank in the middle of the room...{s}

science.name: Make an antidot.e
science.narrator: {i}The strawberries begin to rot and wither.{n}But you'll still have to remove the roots somehow.{s}

operate.name: Try to operate Chiyuri.
operate.narrator: {i}You are a physicist, not a physician !{s}

operate.name: Put Chyuri in one of your cryogenic tubes.
operate.narrator: {i}She falls into a deep sleep. It seems to at least stabilize her.{s}

harvest.name: Harvest.
harvest.narrator: {i}You pick up some of the strawberries.{s}

taste.name: Taste the strawberries.
taste.narrator: {i}You taste one of the fruits.{n}That wasn't very smooth of you, they are poisonous !{s}

jam.name: Make jam.
jam.narrator: {i}You make jam out of the strawberries.{n}Weirdly enough, the jam is actually purple.{s}

feed.name: Feed the bats with the strawberries.
feed.narrator: {i}It seems they'd rather eat something else.{n}

feed.name: Feed the bats with you blood.
feed.narrator: {i}Way to sign a contract with the devil.{n}The bat turns into a youkai girl.{s}

taser.name: Use your gun and exterminate the Youkai.
taser.narrator: {s}A pretty hard danmaku battle awaits{n}But once again, science prevails !{n}You imprison the Youkai in one of your cryogenic tubes.{i}
